name: Project Exa
description:
Design units, command fleets and build stations to defend your Mothership from waves of hostile spaceships in a multitude of unique scenarios!

This game is currently in very early (like extremely early) stages, so there isn't much of a game. But i am committed to release a build every month, and so here is the first one.

You can follow what features im adding on here 

https://trello.com/b/dAibwYT8/projectexa,

And what issues i'm fixing here 

https://trello.com/b/M2CiyVO1/projectexa-issue-tracker

Ship editor controls:

  • Q & E to rotate block ghost
  • M1 & M2 to place / remove blocks
  • WASD to move camera
